views.markdown:
一键修复越狱后Cydia或其他App无法联网的问题

主要解决的是 以上的设备在越狱后，出现App无法联网的问题。

Renet - Fix the network problem after jailbreaking.

support all iOS versions(5.1.1~13.2.3), and all iOS devices(iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro)。支持所有iOS系统(5.1.1~13.2.3)版本及设备(包括iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro), iPad, iPod Touch. 完美兼容最新13.2.3越狱

Contact tinyapps@qq.com anytime you like. 有任何问题，均可直接联系邮件客服

Why we need it? Because newly download apps on iPhones sold in China needs to pop a alert to ask the user for the access to the network. However, once the device is jailbroken, the alert will never appear so that newly downloaded app cannot access the net forever. And, this tweak can address this issue by giving newly downloaded app the privilege to access the net.

1. compatible with iOS 13
1. 增加支持最新的iOS 13 系统。

support all iOS versions(5.1.1~13.2.3), and all iOS devices(iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro)。支持所有iOS系统(5.1.1~13.2.3)版本及设备(包括iPhone 4/4S/5/5S/5C/6/6+/6S/6S+/7/7+/SE/8/8+/X/XR/Xs/Max/11/11Pro), iPad, iPod Touch. 完美兼容最新13.2.3越狱

Contact tinyapps@qq.com anytime you like. 有任何问题，均可直接联系邮件客服
